title: The likability dilemma for women leaders | Robin Hauser
itunes:author: Robin Hauser
description: When women lead, bias often follows. Documentarian Robin Hauser dives into the dilemma between competence and likability faced by women in leadership roles, detangling the unconscious beliefs and gendered thinking that distort what it means to be a good leader.
itunes:subtitle: The likability dilemma for women leaders | Robin Hauser
itunes:summary: When women lead, bias often follows. Documentarian Robin Hauser dives into the dilemma between competence and likability faced by women in leadership roles, detangling the unconscious beliefs and gendered thinking that distort what it means to be a good leader.
